text: Known as the Hellfire Titan, Adaxus was a great [[titan]] of the [[Age of Giants]] who came to power after [[Cul'sir]] began aggressively expanding his [[empire|Cul'sir Dominion]]. Forming a pact with an arch[[fiend]] of fire and greed, he conquered the city of [[Ram'kanek]] and the surrounding area, founding what would be called the [[Sulat League]] (Sulat means "Fire-bound" in [[Old Giant|Giant]]). The ensuing war between the nations of Adaxus and Cul'sir was nearly cataclysmic, as the Sulat summoned swarms of [[demon]]s to clash against the Cul'sir [[oneiromancers|oneiromancy]]. As the Fire Prince's hunger for power and victory transitioned into madness, a group of six Sulat [[titan]]s rose up to defeat and seal him away. Five of these titans went on to become the [[Five Luminaries]] of the [[Sulat League]]; the sixth was [[Ju'qat Reskan Taq]].
title: Adaxus
tags: [[Age of Giants]] Xen'drik deceased giant titan [[Sulat League]]
tooltip: the Hellfire Titan, founder of the Sulat League, formed pacts with fiends, eventually defeated and replaced by the Five Luminaries
